newsitem.title: USA: U.S. stock index futures cut losses, turn mixed.
newsitem.headline: U.S. stock index futures cut losses, turn mixed.

text.p: Sept 27 - U.S. stock index futures cut losses and turned barely mixed. Late further erosion in T-bond futures, which ended moderately lower, had muted impact on stock futures. Blue-chip issues sagged vs strength in high-tech, OTC stocks. Some said lack of downside followthrough could mean more upside. Broker said small liquidity gap starts near 692.10. -Derivatives Desk(312)408-8750/E-mail:derivatives@reuters.com
